=======
LEGEND
=======

letter = A or B or C or D or E or F or G or H or I or J or K or L or M or N or O or P or Q or R or S or T or U or letterV or W or X or Y or Z
number = 1 or 2 or 3 or 4 or 5 or 6 or 7 or 8 or 9 or 0
punctuation = period or comma or colon or semicolon or exclamation or question or singlequote or quote or parenthesisLeft or parenthesisRight or at or ampersand or hash or plus or minus or asterisk or dollar or euro or pound or equal

character = letter or number or punctuation

=======
SOUNDS
=======

================
COLLISIONLAYERS
================

background
player
character
